Subpallium of CIVM postnatal rat brain a.SuperCategory: CIVM postnatal rat brain atlas parcellation scheme region
Subpallium of CIVM postnatal rat brain a.Is part of: Telencephalon of CIVM postnatal rat brain atlas
Subpallium of CIVM postnatal rat brain a.Definition: The subpallium is a superparcellation consisting of the amygdala, accumbens, bed nucleus of the stria terminalis, diagonal domain, pallidum, preoptic area, septum and striatum.
